content.html: This is mesmerising if you watch to the end, all the metronomes will synchronise Using this visual, we can visit a nearly 400 year old mystery of how ordinary clocks placed together, would synch up their pendulums in “sympathy” 1/
content.value:
This is mesmerising if you watch to the end, all the metronomes will synchronise 

Using this visual, we can visit a nearly 400 year old mystery of how ordinary clocks placed together, would synch up their pendulums in “sympathy”  1/
